bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks Station and Media Access Control Connectivity Discovery
IEEE Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks Station and Media Access Control Connectivity Discovery
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P802.1AB/REVD2.2, Dec 2007

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document defines a protocol and a set of managed objects that can be used for discovering the physical topology from adjacent stations in IEEE 802&#174; LANs.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
